This was linked from slashdot today, I haven't read it yet but a 
quick scan down the article shows pictures of neural nets and other 
cool diagrams showing how humans recognise words. Folks interested 
in OCR should defintanely read this...

http://www.microsoft.com/typography/ctfonts/WordRecognition.aspx

Colin.
